text: Hello there! I am in need of additional water due to my health condition What kind of health condition?  We both require water to make it thru the camping trip Due to my blood pressure medicaton, I need to stay hydrated at all times. It is more important for me to drink rather than eat which is why I would give you more food in exchange for more water for me That is understandable but if you were to get the majority of the water I would want all the firewood and 2 packages of food  I am happy to give you 2 packs of food and the lions share of the firewood but I think I need 1 firewood. I am not a good firestarter So are you ok with me getting 1 package of water and 2 firewood and 2 food I am absolutely OK with that deal. Just need to make sure we are both have sufficient supplies because I dont know about you but living off the land would probably be disastrous for me I appreciate your concern. I did bring a little bit of emergency food I think we have struck a deal then.  Unless there is anything else to be discussed I think we can conclude the negotiation  I agree Thanks for the quick negotiation and I am going to submit the deal on my side Submit-Deal Accept-Deal

Hi I would like to let you know that I could really use some extra firewood and food.  I was wondering if we could split it up with me receiving 3 firewood and 3 food and you get 3 water?🙂🙂🙂 Hello, that deal would not work for me. I am in need firewood too. 🙂 How about 2 waters for me, 2 firewood and 1 food for me? Firewood is really my most needed item as I need it for several reasons.  Could we do 3 firewood for me, 3 water for you and then 2 food for me and 1 food for you?  This would really help me out. I see, firewood is your most needed item. I thought food would have been because we all need nutrients. I have a need for firewood too. Yes it is highest priority as I need it to scare off animals as well as cooking food and using to purify water.  If you feel food is most important how about 3 Firewood, 1 food and 2 water for me and 2 food 1 water for you?🙂 I really need at least 1 firewood. How abour 2 firewood, 2 food and 0 water for you? I need to cook for my family and of course warm the bottle for my toddler. I can understand why you would need 1 firewood.  I think i would need a water though, you don't want to let a fire just go in the wild.  So i think what about 2 firewood, 2 food, and 1 water for me and 1 firewood 1 food and 2 water for you and your family.  🙂 I think that could work. I understand the need for the water especially around fire 🙂 Ok it sounds like we have an agreement.  For me I would get 2 firewood, 2 food and 1 water.  You would receive 1 firewood, 1 food and and 2 water.  This sounds like a good deal for both of us.🙂 Yes, we have deal and we are walking away feeling good about what we agreed upon. The camping trip should be a great success. 🙂🙂🙂 Submit-Deal Accept-Deal

Hi there! 🙂 Hello! I'm very excited for this upcoming camping trip!! 🙂 I am as well! I see we have some extra supplies. What are you most in need of? I really could use the extra water. I have two big dogs that are coming along on the trip. How about you? Water would be nice, but I would feel bad taking water from dogs. I guess I could use firewood and food if you need the water. Okay, thanks! How much food would you like?  Well, I could use a combination of firewood and food to make up for missing water. Maybe all the firewood and two food and you get all water and one food? I would be fine with giving you all of the firewood if I get all of the water. I was really hoping to get two of the foods because I wanted to have a small birthday celebration for my husband. :)  If you get all the water, you would be at an advantage with all the higher valued items. I would ask that I'm compensated for giving the higher value items by getting more items overall. Okay, I guess that's fair. 🙂 Submit-Deal Accept-Deal

Hello hope you are excited for the trip Im hoping we can discuss the supplies. I would like to get 2 water 1 food and 2 of the firewood  I can give you 2 waters and 1 food, but I really need more firewood. I ran out last time and I don't want to go through that again! How about you take 2 waters, 1 food, and 1 firewood?  I feel like we are almost there I hunt so im ok with the one food; why would  I only get one firewood? I just want to make sure that I don't run out. I will have my kids with me and need to make sure they don't get too cold 🙂 Understandable I am an avid outdoorsmen; Starting firewood is hard and can also be dangerous; how about you give me the two I will only use one you get one and I will be able to secure more within a few hours.  Are you sure that you would be able to get more firewood on your own? Yes and as a return ill give you 70 percent of what I get-- So with me managing the firewood for you, you will get more time with the kids. That's so nice of you! I would just feel more secure if I kept 2 of the firewood with me while you are out though, just in case of emergency. You wouldn't need it just for the few hours you would be gone.  If that were the case I would need extra food since I would be behind trying to get more firewood..   That makes sense. I would be willing to split the extra food package with you when you get back to camp. Then we would be even all the way around.   Submit-Deal Accept-Deal

Hello, how are you doing today? Very good. How about you? I'm doing well. I'm looking forward to going on my camping trip but will need some additional items to make sure the trip is safe, healthy, and enjoyable.  Same here.  I have diabetes, so it is very important to me that I get extra packages of water and food. When I'm at home, I always need to pack extra drinks and snacks for myself in case I go into shock and need to take medication. The trip could be very dangerous for me if I don't have access to these additional supplies.  Actually mine own purposeful need is firewood and water. Being on a first time adventure, I lack these items as I was inadequately prepared. Okay, so firewood and water are your two most pressing needs? Yes. Okay. I'm willing to give in on the firewood, but I really can't give in on the water or the food. As a diabetic I have to put my health first.  I can give out the food in exchange for the firewood Okay. I need all of the water, if you're getting the firewood.  I can't give out all the water. I need to be hydrated as well.  You already have all the basics, though, so you won't lack sufficient water to be hydrated. I have a serious medical condition that requires that I have access to additional water.  The maximum bundle I can give is all packages of food + 1 package of water Sorry, that won't work for me. I've already said that I have a medical condition that requires additional water. You do not need that much water just to be hydrated -- you already have basic water. I can give you all of the firewood, but I need all of the water.  In that case I exchange all the water only for all your firewood I can give you all the firewood - but as a diabetic, I still need at least one extra package of food for my blood sugar levels. So, as my final offer I can give you all of the firewood, and two extra packages of food. Do you agree to these terms? No, I give out only one extra package of food I think you misunderstood what I said. I said that *you* would receive all of the firewood, and two extra packages of food.  ok Ok, great. It was nice negotiating with you. same here Submit-Deal Accept-Deal

Hello, I think that I should get all of the water packages, 2 firewood and you can have all of the food.🙂 Hi there, i appreciate your initial offer.  What is your offer on the additional packages? I would be willing to give you all of the firewood (3) and two of the water (2) while I get the rest Ok great, are you going to be ok with getting your own water and firewood during the trip? I think that I will be able to, so I'd like to offer you those extras.🙂 Thank you, it would have been difficult for me to get more firewood and I appreciate the additional water. So I get 3 firewood, 2 water and 0 food. Yes, I think that deal will be the most helpful to both of us. I appreciate the food, which is important to me. You are welcome. Thank you for being so understanding, the extra packages are really going to come in handy for me!🙂 Perfect, I will submit the deal after just a few more messages. You were great to work with! I agree and thanks, you also! Submit-Deal Accept-Deal

Hello there, I'm trying to get some more water. I take medication that makes me dehydrated. Is there something you mite be looking for in exchange? I'm sorry to hear about that -- I've been needing water because my child is with me and I can't let them get dehydrated since they're so young. Could we split the other items? We mite can do that. What do you need more of? do you want extra firewood if I take extra water? At the least, Do you think I could get a little extra food if I give you some extra water as well? yes, that would work for sure Thats Good, I'm a big guy and like to eat when I'm out and about.  what if we do 3 water for me, 3 food for you, and split the firewood? No, that won't work. I told you in the begining I needed some water because of the medication I'm on. that's right, how about i take 2 water, and you take 2 food? well I was going to let you have two being you have a kid to look out for. But i atleast need the one. So how about I get one water you get two. Then I get Two fire wood and two foods? Submit-Deal Accept-Deal

Good afternoon, how are doing today? Let's get this thing going. What items are you most interested? Hello , i am well. i dont need much so i would say an equal amount. I have a medical condition that require me to drink a ton of water. I also can only eat certain foods and I have 3 kids. The more food and water the better for us. sorry to hear that. i too have kids but my health is ok so i can do with 1 water. Thank you. 🙂 Would 1 food and 3 firewood work for you? No problem🙂, i would be fine with 1 water, 1 food,and 3 firewood. That works for me. Glad we could hammer out a deal. 🙂 What are you using all the firewood for? so just to be clear that 1 water 1 food and 2 firewoods, and probably have a bon fire. Correct We will take 2 food, 2 water and 1 firewood. Very cool. Thank you so mush im glad we came to a deal. Submit-Deal Accept-Deal

Hello, how are you today? 🙂 good, how are you 🙂 Great!  I'm on a camping trip with my five children, how about you? I'm also going camping with my two children and 2 of my nephews  How would you like to divide the supplies? Well what do you need the most of? I need the most firewood due to a congenital issue that results in us having poor blood circulation to our extremities, thus making them susceptible to frostbite in the cold! Oh dear, that sounds serious!  Well I need food the most because my children eat sooo much and I don't think I packed enough.  How about I'll give you all my firewood in exchange for all your food? Would you be down for an arrangement where I get 2 wood, I get 1 food, and 1 water? Sure that sounds good!  I hope you have a nice trip! you too! Submit-Deal Accept-Deal

Hello, how are you doing? ☹️ Not too good. I was robbed earlier before my camping trip with my boy. I need more items so I can take him on a camping trip that I've promised him for almost 6 months now. Oh that is a shame. I am currently training for a marathon in Greenland and I am trying to maintain my weight during this trip. What did they steal from you? Well after leaving the grocery, I put my groceries in my car and then got into the driver's seat. When I sat down, a man pointed his gun at me and told me to put my wallet in the center console and then get out the car. He took my car, wallet and all of my groceries. There were 3 packages of water, 3 bundles of firewood and 3 packages of food.  I hope they catch that guy, well since you are close to our campsite we could cook something together. My husband brought his bow and fishing rod so I think we plan on getting some more food that way. 🙂That would be really nice of you, but my son is grown. He has a hearty appetite. I really need to feed him his snacks because he is Austic and throws tantrums if he doesn't eat particular foods. Same goes with water.  I understand, our nephew has autism as well but not much of an appetite. We could also let you borrow the fishing rod and go out with your son for some bonding time. If you catch a fish or two that could help the trade on how much food I would be willing to give up. I am horribly afraid of darkness, so I would like more than enough firewood. 😮If you could provide us with the food, it would be greatly appreciated. I recently lost my job so I was trying to take my boy on a trip to also get my mind off of things. I won't eat throughout the week if you can provide 2 fish; however, if you did have a spare and could make it three, that would be greatly appreciated. One thing about the robbery that makes me really upset is that this guy took our firewood. I walked home after calling the police and was able to stop by a local park. There was some sticks I gathered to bring with us, but it won't last. Any chance you can spare a few bundles? Hmmm, we picked up the firewood when we arrived the campsite because the park rangers do not want people bringing invasive pests to the area. I am horribly terrified of the dark and we are taking this trip for my husbands birthday. If it gets too dark I will not be able to sleep and it will not be good for my mental preparation for my marathon I have at the end of the month. I would really prefer to hand out more food than firewood since my husband is an amazing fisherman and I also enjoy eating squirrel.  Well how about this, I won't bother you about the firewood. I know it is something that seems beneficial to your well being. I can totally relate to that. For me, I would honestly rather any food you can spare, but my concern is water. It being the summer and a drought now, I don't think we'll make it through the weekend without any water. I can't afford any ☹️. Do you think you can possibly provide us with 3 fish and 3 packages of water? Ok, I can give you two packages of food and two waters, we should be okay boiling our water. Since my husband will be hunting for the extra food we will clean it and cook it, so can you give 2 packages of firewood? I have no firewood. I have nothing! I was robbed ☹️. If you want 1 package of firewood, I can give you 1. However, I am going to need more food and water. I have sjorgren's syndrome. It causes me to dry out. My eyes, throat and really my full body gets dried up. Its caused me to convulse in the past and have seizures. If something happens to me when I'm out in the words. Who will take care of my boy? I need to make sure I don't have an accident out there or they may take my son away from me. Well we will be nearby. Camping sounds a little dangerous with your condition. I suggest since you have no supplies to really offer that you stay next to our camp and share our fire. The ranger will give you the firewood upon arrival, if you give up the all 3 packages of firewood I will provide 2 food and 2 waters. Submit-Deal Accept-Deal

Hi! Hope you are enjoying your time outdoors.  Hi!  So far so good.  It's been pretty hot.  I hope you are enjoying it as well. Yes, it is always fun camping with the family. But I heard that the weather is going to get very cold this evening. Same here.  I love camping.  I'm looking forward to the trip.  I enjoy the nights when they get chilly. We normally do as well but it so happens we are not carrying any firewood and could not find any at the stores close by. Now we are kinda worried. Oh no.  That's a shame.  I'm a little concerned about firewood as well.  I was hoping to be able to grab some.  I don't know if I have enough to get me through the trip. We don't have any unfortunately and we have kids with us. I hope you understand ☹️ I absolutely understand.  I have kids as well. It's pretty ridiculous that the store is out of firewood 😡.  What is your plan? Well we can take 2 and you can take 1 in case you absolutely need it. Else we can take the firewood if thats okay. I could consider that.  I'm worried about running out of firewood.  Would you be willing to send over 3 of your waters if I gave you 2 firewood?   I will be willing to give you 2 waters if i get 2 firewoods. We can do with 1 water I think but we will need at least 1 water Ok.  So 2 firewoods for 2 waters.  That works for me.  And we can agree that we are both good on food? how many foods would you need? I would need one from you at most. Okay. So I take 2 firewoods, 1 water and 2 foods and you take 1 firewood, 2 waters and 1 food. Is that okay? That works for me. Submit-Deal Accept-Deal

Good afternoon! How are you? i'm fine. wehat about you? I can't complain! Just looing forward to going camping! Do you think you can spare some firewood? i have only one spare I understand and would appreciate it if you would give me the spare! Is there any way you might give me all of the food? I tend to get really hungry! but i need 2 pack of firewood 2 pack water and 1 pack of food Okay, I can accomodate that. So you will give me one firewood, one water, and two foods, right? okay fine. it will be better for us Okay! We have a deal! Now let the camping fun begin! yeah sure.  thank you for your time with me Submit-Deal Accept-Deal

Hi there - I need extra firewood So do I. I have a medical condition that causes my veins to close when I get cold. ☹️ I really need it for my children who get cold at night and we read bedtime stories, so need to be able to see.  Lastly, I really need it to warm up a bottle for my baby. You have kids!🙂 Do you need extra food? I'm on a diet, so I don't eat so much. I have food because my baby is mostly on bottled milk. Can I 2 firewood and 2 waters to mix up the formula? I would be willing to give you two waters if I could have two firewood. I don't want my veins to close and freeze to death. I understand, but I really need the firewood for my kids. There are 4 of us. I understand, but if my veins shut down I could die. Alright alright... I'll give you 2 firewood for all the food and water 🙂 😮 How about 1 firewood, 2 waters, and 2 food for you. 2 firewood, 1 water, and 1 food for me? How about 1 firewood and 3 waters for me... sorry but my baby could die if she doesnt eat. and 1 food for you? I'll let you have the three waters. If I could have 2 food. That way things are mostly split down the middle. fine thanks! Submit-Deal Accept-Deal

Hi, How are you today? Great! I'm so excited to go camping. How are you?🙂 Me too, feeling great. Nice weather! Yes it sure is. It'll be great to finally get out of the house. What supplies are you hoping to stock up on before the trip> True. I would love it if you stock me up with 3 packages of water and 2 packages of firewood and i will give up 2 food. Sounds like we have the same Christmas list haha. My family has a bunch of hikes planned so we need water too. Ooops! You mean we came out a whole lot of us!🙂 How's this... one of us gets 2 waters,1 firewood and 2 foods, the other 1 water, 2 firewoods and 1 food. Pick whichever you like. I will go for the first, 2 waters, 1 firewoodand 2 foods. Looks like we have a deal🙂 Great. Have a fun trip! Submit-Deal Accept-Deal

Hello! I'm excited to go camping. How about you> Yeah, I love to camp! :D 🙂 What supplies do you need most? I need water the most, food the least, how bout you? I need food the most and firewood the least. I gotcha. We could work out a good deal then  Yeah should be easy. My food problem is because my son eats like 5000 calories a day. ooof, growing kids, I know what you are saying! Okay, so let's see. How about food (2 me 1 you), water (2 you 1 me), and firewood (2 me 1 you)? hmmm, Can I have 3 things of water, you can have all the food and I get 2 fire wood, you get 1 fire wood?   So I get 3 water, 2 fire wood, and 0 food? Switch the firewood allotment and you got a deal. Sounds fine to me! 🙂 Submit-Deal Accept-Deal

How's it going?  If it's alright with you, you can have all of the water and I'll take all of the firewood.  We can work out a deal on the food as well. I have circulatory issued due to a heart condition and cold quickly. I would appreciate if I could get at least 2 of the firewood. You can have 2 of the food so you won't get hungry. 🙂 I was planning on building a big bonfire for the evening.  There'd be plenty of room if you wanted to join for warmth.  I'm a bit hungry and would appreciate the extra food.  You can have all of the water if you'd like.  If you warm it by the bonfire, it may be useful to soak in to improve your circulation. I get tired to easy so I probably won't be much fun at a bonfire ☹️. I really do appreciate the offer though. I would think the extra food would do you more good for your party.  The extra food would be appreciated.  How about if I take just two each of the firewood and food, and you can have the remainder, plus all of the water? I am just concerned that only 1 firewood might make it so I'm too cold to function.  If you boil the water above the fire, it will provide additional heat over time.  You would also be able to make tea, which would warm you up from the inside as well, better than any fire would.  That would probably be most beneficial to you.  I really do need the 2 firewood if there's any chance of making a bonfire for my party. I am allergic to tea and coffee. I wonder if the smaller fire would be more quaint for everyone to sit around.  It really wouldn't do the job that well at all.  You could always prepare hot cocoa or use your share of the food to make a warm stew.  I really do need at least the two firewood and a couple of food.  You can have all the water to make a hearty and hot stew to get your through the night, though. I can't eat much anyway because of the health issues. You could have all of the food if I could get the extra firewood. That would still give you an extra firewood in addition to the basic supply and lots of extra food for your party. I'm sure they would love having some of the stew you mentioned. Well, how about I take just the one extra firewood, plus all of the food, and one of the water so that I can make stew?  Would that work for you? That sounds good. I hope your party is wonderful. Submit-Deal Accept-Deal

:) Hey there, what are you planning to do on your trip? Hi, I was planning to go to the river. How about yourself? I'm going to be exploring the area around the site. I haven't been here before so it will be novel. What do you think the weather will be like? The weather is suppose to be very hot, that is why I am in need of the water  Yeah I can understand that. I also need water, but since I'm going to be moving around a lot, food is my highest concern. It sounds like neither one of us will be too concerned about firewood. I am wanting to build a fire, to be able to cook on. Since I will be on the river, I will have some water. What about If I had 2 of the firewood and the food. What if you have all the water and one food? Well, I'm glad you plan to build a fire! I don't, so I'd be willing to let you have all 3 firewood. I need some of the food as well. How about you take all 3 firewood, and I get 2 food and 3 water (you will have extra water, after all)? That is true. I would need some food, since I will not have any water. What if I have the 3 firewood and 2 food. That way you have the water so you will not be parched and you will have a food as well.  I think we're close to an agreement here! 🙂 Given that I plan to be very active, I'd still like to keep 2 of the food if I can. If I give up one water (who knows what you'll need, and the river won't be for drinking!), could we do a deal where I get 2 food and 2 water and you get all 3 firewood and 1 food and 1 water? Maybe you could catch some fish (if I do, I could share)? That is a great agreement! I would be happy with the 3 firewood, 1 food and one water. I hope we do catch alot of fish!🙂 Submit-Deal Accept-Deal

We are a family of 8 among of which I have 5 juniors at a growing age with high food consumption. Thus, the need to exchange have we have, water, for the much needed food. Oh i am sorry to say we have a large family as well with growing children and a breastfeeding mom. We will have to work out the food situation.  How about I include some firewood? Remember you have the basic food in your arsenal. I would just like to exchange for the extra you have. Yes i know, as you should take that into consideration as well. You said you dont need water so lets agree on me having 3 and you can have all the firewood.  Not even to spare a package of food? ☹️ No i think i can take 2 food, 3 water, 0 firewood.  Food is my most essential as well. A package is not enough for us As i said we are a family of the same size. I can give you 2 but thats it, in exchange i would like 2 fire wood as we will need to hunt. So you get 2 food, 0 water, 1 firewood Lets make it 2 food, 1 water, 1 firewood Sure that sounds fair ok Submit-Deal Accept-Deal

Hello. How is your camping trip going? It is going well so far, but I definitly need a few things. 🙂 How about yourself? Yes, I really need some extra food because I have a large family. Is there anything you really need? Honestly? I really need more firewood. I get cold at night and did not bring enough apparently. I'm willing to let you take the 3 firewood if you let me have the 3 food. I would be happy with that. How are you doing on water? I could use a bit of that myself. Would you be okay with taking 1 water? I really need extra because my family and I are going for a hike. Any chance you will come across a stream during your hike to fill water bottles? I don't plan to hike so won't have a chance to do any refills.🙂 You make an excellent point. I should get at least 1 water to be able to last us until we get to a stream. I would be happy with that. We can do 3 Firewood for me and 2 water. Then the 3 food for you and 1 water? Submit-Deal Accept-Deal

Hi, 🙂 can we make a deal for me having 3 water, 2 food, and 2 firewood? no what about this, I get 3 firewood then rest is yours I think can highly consider it, why do you prefer the firewood?  for me, firewood is more useful  I see. What do things would you use the firewood for? cooking, and sometimes I put firewood in the fireplace to keep me warm Those are good uses. I think can make a deal. Three firewood for you and I get three water and three food? that's right Alright a deal it's, thank you for cooperating  🙂 Submit-Deal Accept-Deal

Hi hello how are you?  I am good thank you I was hoping we could agree on the importance of food while camping. I would like all 3 packages, if thats okay with you? Well it is not okay I feel food is less important I was thinking that, while camping there are so many uncertainties, from wild life, loss of food, spoiling, what if we are stuck at the camp for whatever reason, having the food available brings a peace of mind, what do you think? Well I still think 1 or two packages will do. Probably 3 packages each for water and firewood sounds like a better idea what do you think? do you think we can comprise with 2 food and 2 waters? maybe middle ground would make both of us a bit more comfortable making a deal? Okay it sounds like a good idea thank you so much, for firewood what would make you the happiest? I thought we agreed on 2 packages extra for each item? awesome! 2 for all 3 categories, submitting now, thank you so much. have a wonderful day  You too Submit-Deal Accept-Deal

Hi there. Have you ever been camping? I have, i love camping! How about you? I have not, but I don't really have an interest for it, either. Thats a shame, i am sure you would like it if you give it a try, especially if you build a large fire 🙂 I was going to say, the fire would be probably one of the few things I would be interested in! I love being warm. Well you can take all the firewood if it will help, would it be ok if i get all the food in return? That works for me. How would you like to divide the water? I am ok with you taking two waters since you are new to camping, does that seem fair to you? Yes, that seems fair to me. So you get 3 firewoods and two waters and i get 3 foods and one water, deal? we have a deal! great speaking with you today 🙂 Submit-Deal Accept-Deal

Hi. I'm really excited about this upcoming camping trip. I'm glad to hear that. 🙂 I'm excited too but I am a bit worried I didn't bring enough supplies. I'm set for firewood if you need the extra. 🙂 Thanks, I could use a bit of firewood but I'm actually more worried about water. The thing I'm most worried about is food. I'm 8 months pregnant, so I have a lot of cravings. 🙂 First off, Congrats on the baby. That must be very exciting. And I think I can some food for a mother to be. Thank you! If you are cool with it, you can have all of the water, and I'll take all the food. Actually with a baby on the way, you might need some extra water to go with that food. Drinking and eating for 2 and all. Okay, so what were you thinking? Why don't you take all 3 of the food and a water while I can use the 2 waters and the firewood. Submit-Deal Accept-Deal

I am looking to make a tasty meal for my camp. I will need lots of firewood and food if that's ok with you.  A tasty meal is exciting! I will gladly support your desire for good food. I am most in need of water, as I am concerned about getting dehydrated in the heat. Ok I will be willing to give you water if I can get my goods.  That is fair! How many of the food and water do you need? You can have all the water if I can get all the firewood and two foods. Is that ok? That works for me! Where are you going camping? I'm going to Yosemite it is a beautiful place. What about you? I have never been there! Sounds amazing. We are staying local because of corona virus. It is sure to be here so that is why I need the water so much! That is very smart. I hope you have a great trip and stay hydrated! I will think of you on my trip and appreciate your water generosity! Best of luck with your tasty meal! Submit-Deal Accept-Deal

Hi, how are you? Hi, I'm good! Looking to get a bunch of food and firewood for this trip 🙂 Nice! I'll give you all the food if I can have the firewood and water I can part with the water, but I'd at least like some extra firewood to cook my food OK, how about we split each of them? I'm thinking you could get 2 food, 1 firewood and 1 water I'd rather get the entirety of the food and 2 firewood if possible. I can't do that unfortunately. Seems like we both have those 2 as our top priorities! I can give you all the food but I'd need all the firewood and 2 waters Which do you need more, firewood or water? Firewood Okay, so you will get 3 firewood 2 water. I will get 3 food 1 water. is that fine? yep that works! Submit-Deal Accept-Deal

Hello how are you doing today? hello, doing great, how is the camping trip going? I am getting ready for it.
